summary: Diff adds PWA support (manifest, service worker, offline fallback, registration, UI offline banner) and a Capacitor-style Android wrapper project plus Android build documentation. One key gap is that the required icon image files themselves are not shown as added. Additionally, some Android build configuration appears to include optional Google Services scaffolding which was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the required PWA/Android install icons as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (512x512, 192x192, and 512x512 maskable).
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and service worker reference the required PNG files under /assets/generated, but the diff summary does not show these image files being added to the repository.

hallucinated_features.description: Google Services / google-services.json conditional configuration in the Android wrapper (push-notifications-related scaffolding).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists push notifications as a non-goal, but the Android Gradle files include the Google Services classpath and conditional plugin application with messaging about push notifications.
